# CitaviRMacros

A set of custom Citavi macros that complement [CitaviR](https://github.com/SchmidtPaul/CitaviR#citavir-).

 * **Excel-Import Macros (CIMR)**
   + [**CIMR 001** - Import find_obvious_dup info](CIMR Import/CIMR 001 - Import find_obvious_dup info/)
   + [**CIMR 002** - Import handle_obvious_dup info](CIMR Import/CIMR 002 - Import handle_obvious_dup info/)
   + [**CIMR 010** - Import categories](CIMR Import/CIMR 010 - Import categories/)
